content.raw:
Sorry for the delay in responding. It looks like the crux of the error is in the `OGRE EXCEPTION` where it can't find a codec for png. I haven't seen that before, but it could be related to the version of libpng or freeimage that you are using.

I have recently created bottles for ogre and gazebo6 for yosemite. Can you try installing again?

Also, it's easy to miss issues in this repo, if you have any further trouble with installing via homebrew, I recommend the issue tracker for our homebrew tap:

* https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/issues
content.html:
Sorry for the delay in responding. It looks like the crux of the error is in the OGRE EXCEPTION where it can't find a codec for png. I haven't seen that before, but it could be related to the version of libpng or freeimage that you are using.

I have recently created bottles for ogre and gazebo6 for yosemite. Can you try installing again?

Also, it's easy to miss issues in this repo, if you have any further trouble with installing via homebrew, I recommend the issue tracker for our homebrew tap:

  • https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/issues
